main event: A witness observed a pink light in the sky while driving in Bradford, Massachusetts on December 24, 1967.
interesting points: The light moved slowly in front of the car before suddenly shooting upwards at high speed,The witness reported seeing the same pink light again two nights later behaving similarly,The object was described as roughly the size of a basketball and pink in color,There were three confirmed witnesses to the sighting,The observation lasted initially about 2 minutes and was viewed clearly without any sound.
sighted object: a pink light in the sky
witness description: The witness described the object as a pink light that moved in an unusual manner, unlike any conventional aircraft.
